alert.note: Alert for Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 2:44PM EST until December 11 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM SUNDAY TO 9 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southerly winds of 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 50 mph. * WHERE... Plymouth and southern Bristol counties in Massachusetts and Washington, Bristol, and Newport counties in Rhode Island. * WHEN... Sunday evening through early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down branches and trees, which could lead to power disruptions.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of 31 to 39 mph are expected, with gusts between 46 to 57 mph. Winds this strong are capable of downing small tree limbs and branches, possibly causing isolated power outages. Driving can also be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth
